div.div: CCPS is following the directive of the Maryland State Department of Education to close schools through May 15. All school activities are canceled through Sunday, May 17. No community activities will be held in schools during this time. All pre-K and K registration dates scheduled during the time schools are closed will be rescheduled and publicized.
